info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:51PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CASS AND ST. JOSEPH COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM EDT... At 851 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marcellus, or 10 miles south of Paw Paw, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marcellus around 855 PM EDT. Three Rivers around 900 PM EDT. Centreville around 910 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Nottawa, Moore Park, Burr Oak, Mendon, Fishers Lake, Fairfax, Leonidas, Fawn River, Corey Lake, and Howardsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for southwestern Michigan.
